document_title: National Food Security and Nutrition Mission (NFSNM)
objective: To enhance food security and nutrition in the country
how_to_apply: Submit proposal to the Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Get approval from the General Council
official_links: Website of the Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
helpline: Director (Crops), Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
notes: The NFSNM is a centrally sponsored scheme launched in 2025
